Articles.Content:
Yes, it's the same WWTI? you've all come to possibly be vaguely aware of. I'm back after losing my account in the server outage of 2013.

I play on the KLF server ts3.general-physics.de, come check it out!

I use KW Rocketry, assorted parts from the NP Remix Pack and Soyuz Pack, and the Bobcat HOME mod, along with the Kerbal Engineer Redux plugin.

Just wanted to say hi again and to prove that I'm the real WWTI?
